column1: We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!
Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer. However
column2: until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

column1: We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together.
More about us
column2: we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely
column3: Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid
column4: so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew
column5: we took more people on board. Firstly Paula
column6: a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 10 years now
column7: also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least
column9: whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often when the baby will be born and Vanessa will disappear for a while).

column1: We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them
column2: but more importantly
column3: we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-)

column1: We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet.
We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!
Vanessa_Oscar_Paula (& Nuria)";email

column1: We are Belén and Javier. We work in the fashion industry (Belén) and in the art and culture industry (Javier). We have a huge house and would love to share it with you...
WE LOVE OUR GUESTS!!!

We are very happy about hosting you in our big apartment in Madrid. We love the city and will try to make your stay here as comfortable and wonderful as possible. We will serve breakfast for you everyday (home made bread!!!).
Cleanliness is one of the most important thing for us when we travel so we keep the place superclean.
We live in the very heart of the city and will give you a huge list of things to do (including local tips).
We also operate a restaurant in the multi cultural neighboorhood of Lavapiés.

Hermosas paredes correderas de cristal se utilizan como puertas potenciando la belleza de este ático. Su dormitorio tiene un amplio armario con un gran espejo y una cómoda cama doble con mesita de noche y lámparas. El baño es ""en suite"" y con diferentes niveles. column1: We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!
Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer. However
column2: until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

column1: We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together.
More about us
column2: we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely
column3: Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid
column4: so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew
column5: we took more people on board. Firstly Paula
column6: a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 10 years now
column7: also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least
column9: whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often when the baby will be born and Vanessa will disappear for a while).

column1: We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them
column2: but more importantly
column3: we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-)

column1: We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet.
We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!
Vanessa_Oscar_Paula (& Nuria)";email

column1: 3365;Loft de diseño en Madrid centro;Te va a encantar nuestra casa debido a el espacio acogedor
column2: la comodidad de las camas

column4: y la cocina. Nuestro alojamiento es bueno para familias (con hijos) y grupos. Decorada con estilo industrial se encuentra a 10 minutos andando del Barrio de Salamanca y a cinco minutos andando del auditorio nacional y Estadio Santiago Bernabeu. Esta a tres minutos a pie del metro Alfonso XIII.;El piso consta de tres dormitorios. Los dormitorios 1 y 2 tienen un sofá cama en planta (de 110 cm y 200 cm respectivamente) y una cama de matrimonio en entreplanta. El dormitorio 3 consta de una cama de matrimonio. Los tres dormitorio tienen mesa de trabajo. Tiene dos cuartos de baño completos y un salón con cocina integrada y todos los útiles y utensilios necesarios para cocinar. La vivienda tiene wi fi y televisión así como calefacción radiante en el suelo. You'll love our home because of the cozy space
column7: and kitchen. Our accommodation is good for families (with children) and groups. column14: valencianos... a;"Lavapies es un barrio particularmente interesante dentro de Madrid.  Las huellas que su historia centenaria de cruce de culturas ha ido dejando por sus rincones y además la mezcla de etnias y culturas que actualmente conviven en él lo convierten en un barrio fascinante y lleno de vida
column15: que atrae al visitante y no deja indiferente a nadie.  Lavapies no es un barrio más en el Madrid histórico. Es a la vez el más ""castizo"" (típicamente Madrileño) y multicultural de todos ellos. Y esta dualidad casi antagónica se consigue por el alto grado de tolerancia y curiosidad hacia otras culturas que practican sus vecinos. Es y ha sido así por siglos y siglos

column1: We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!
Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer. However
column2: until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

column1: We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together.
More about us
column2: we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely
column3: Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid
column4: so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew
column5: we took more people on board. Firstly Paula
column6: a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 10 years now
column7: also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least
column9: whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often when the baby will be born and Vanessa will disappear for a while).

column1: We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them
column2: but more importantly
column3: we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-)

column1: We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet.
We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!
Vanessa_Oscar_Paula (& Nuria)";email

Freshly renovated, modern, and fully equipped apartments located in a beautiful Spanish colonial building in the heart of the iconic Centro district of Madrid.  The Aparment has air conditioning, unlimited free WiFi, flat screen TVs, modern kitchen outfitted with: pots, pans, plates, cutlery, ovens, microwaves, dishwashers, coffee machines, and laundry washing machines.
